cms.query.QueryText: SELECT P.* FROM [CMS_Resource] R, [CMS_Site] S , [CMS_ResourceSite] RS, [CMS_Permission] P WHERE (P.PermissionName = @PermissionName) AND (R.ResourceName=@ResourceName AND P.ResourceID = R.ResourceID) AND (RS.ResourceID = R.ResourceID) AND (S.SiteName = @SiteName AND RS.SiteID = S.SiteID)
